full_policy_text: This policy applies to Salaried (Public Sector) applicants purchasing Commercial Trucks vehicles. The interest rate is set at 14.77% with a maximum repayment period of 60 months. Applicants must not exceed a Debt Burden Ratio (DBR) of 40%. Minimum verifiable monthly income requirement is 25000 EGP.

This policy applies to Freelancer (Creative) applicants purchasing Commercial Trucks vehicles. The interest rate is set at 20.51% with a maximum repayment period of 84 months. Applicants must not exceed a Debt Burden Ratio (DBR) of 55%. Minimum verifiable monthly income requirement is 5000 EGP.

This policy applies to Salaried (Private) applicants purchasing New Only vehicles. The interest rate is set at 14.62% with a maximum repayment period of 84 months. Applicants must not exceed a Debt Burden Ratio (DBR) of 60%. Minimum verifiable monthly income requirement is 7000 EGP.

This policy applies to Freelancer (Creative) applicants purchasing Used (Up to 5 yrs) vehicles. The interest rate is set at 21.07% with a maximum repayment period of 48 months. Applicants must not exceed a Debt Burden Ratio (DBR) of 60%. Minimum verifiable monthly income requirement is 5000 EGP.

This policy applies to Retired / Pensioner applicants purchasing New Only vehicles. The interest rate is set at 16.94% with a maximum repayment period of 96 months. Applicants must not exceed a Debt Burden Ratio (DBR) of 55%. Minimum verifiable monthly income requirement is 7000 EGP.

This policy applies to Retired / Pensioner applicants purchasing Electric/Hybrid vehicles. The interest rate is set at 13.03% with a maximum repayment period of 48 months. Applicants must not exceed a Debt Burden Ratio (DBR) of 60%. Minimum verifiable monthly income requirement is 40000 EGP.
